DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this project is to determine if intranasal corticosteroids have an effect on nasal obstruction in patients with nasal septal deviation.
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness of Nasal Corticosteroids Versus Placebo in Nasal Obstruction in Patients With Nasal Septal Deviation
DOC.criteria: Age greater than 18 NOSE score greater than 55 Nasal septal deviation on exam Intranasal steroid use within the last three months Current systemic steroid use Prior septal surgery Individuals who are pregnant or actively breastfeeding
